TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssociationAttribute extends System.Data.Linq.Mapping.DataAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssociationAttribute Inherits DataAttribute

summary.span: 指定屬性表示資料庫關聯，例如外部索引鍵關聯性。

span.span: Designates a property to represent a database association, such as a foreign key relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來代表在資料庫中，例如外部索引鍵與主索引鍵之間的關聯性的關聯。Use this attribute to represent an association in a database, such as the relationship between a foreign key and a primary key. 在下列範例中，`Order`類別包含客戶的訂單建立關聯的屬性。In the following example, the `Order` class includes an attribute to associate Orders with Customers. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 處於其外部索引鍵成員都不可為 null 的 1:1 關聯時，若關聯設為 null 則會刪除物件。

span.span: When placed on a 1:1 association whose foreign key members are all non-nullable, deletes the object when the association is set to null.

value.span: 設定為 會刪除物件。

summary.span: 取得或設定關聯的刪除行為。

span.span: Gets or sets delete behavior for an association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定為 null，不刪除行為已加入。If set to null, no delete behavior is added. 例如，"CASCADE"會加入"ON DELETE CASCADE"的外部索引鍵關聯性。For example, "CASCADE" would add "ON DELETE CASCADE" to the foreign-key relationship. 在下列範例中，規則就會不採取任何動作。In the following example, the rule is to take no action. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定成員，做為表示資料庫關聯性之關聯中的外部索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the member as the foreign key in an association representing a database relationship.

summary.span: 取得或設定外部索引鍵的唯一性條件約束表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the indication of a uniqueness constraint on the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若為 true，則這個屬性會指出，則為 true 的 1:1 關聯性。When true, this property indicates a true 1:1 relationship.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定目標實體類別的一個或多個成員，做為關聯另一端的索引鍵值。

span.span: Gets or sets one or more members of the target entity class as key values on the other side of the association.

value.span: 預設 = 相關類別的 ID。

span.span: Default = Id of the related class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為多個成員，使用逗號分隔的清單。For multiple members, use a comma-separated list. 金鑰不符合所需的主索引鍵或外部索引鍵，但使用者所述的基數 (0-1或 0-n 的) 假設為 true。The key is not required to match the primary key or foreign key, but the user-stated cardinality (0-1 for or 0-n for ) is assumed to be true. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ThisKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ThisKey : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定實體類別的成員，表示關聯這一端的索引鍵值。

span.span: Gets or sets members of this entity class to represent the key values on this side of the association.

value.span: 預設 = 包含類別的 ID。

span.span: Default = Id of the containing class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為多個成員，使用逗號分隔的清單。For multiple members, use a comma-separated list. 金鑰不符合所需的主索引鍵或外部索引鍵，但使用者所述的基數 (0-1或 0-n 的) 假設為 true。The key is not required to match the primary key or foreign key, but the user-stated cardinality (0-1 for or 0-n for ) is assumed to be true. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#3)]
